tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I generally take doctor's advice with utmost seriousness provided the doctor is very trustworthy & genuine. In Dr. Rohit's case I found the same and followed likewise. He insists on taking care of the babies in the most basic and natural ways. I remember during my baby's breastfeeding period, I told the doctor about my exhaustion and tiredness to continue so, but he  firmly insisted that I provide nothing but only breastmilk to my baby for first 6 months, and I did follow as he suggested. Now I surely see the result. I recommend Dr. Rohit for his genuine advises and guidance. Thanks.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We have been visiting Rohit sir when my baby was 1 month old.he patiently listens to us,addresses all our concerns.infact sometimes I doubt about baby's health and doctor will say no that's normal and he is not such kind of person who asks us to visit unnecessary even the child is fine.he infact say no problem no need to visit.. he comes to our level and answers everything.yoy can blindly go head to him and thank me later..(mother of medansh ayan)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Rohit is very friendly and Patient listener. He checks thoroughly, explains about the issue and treatment. He prescribes medicines, only if necessary, are of minimum dosage. He advises for home-made food and healthy diet. Highly recommend him. 
Thank you Dr. Rohit

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor was very friendly and patiently listened to all the symptoms and prescribed only the relevant medicines after thorough examination of my kid. He did not suggest extra tests which are not really required at this point. Would highly recommend Dr. Rohit to my friends for sure..

We have always trusted doctor Rohit Khandalwal 
 He is the best. We have been going to him when my son was 4 years of age. He does not give many medicines and always looks for long term remedy. We are very satisfied with his treatment and hospitality.

review:
Dr Rohit is good at managing cases .  I took my child to him and he asked all the questions and listened to all my problems. Then he examined him thoroughly and explained the disease to me. He told he will not write antibiotics unnecessarily. 
My child responded well to his treatment. M happy that I found him on Practo and lucky to meet him.  From now on I will visit dr Rohit only. 
Thanks so much. I would recommend his name to all my friends and colleagues also

review: Dr Rohit is very friendly and experiencedMy daughter had high grade fever 103-104 ,Sir gave lot of confidence to me as I was very anxious as a father.he diagnosed it accurately and did not recommend unnecessary tests.Really appreciate kind help  my daughter has recovered very wellThanks again Rohit Sir..
